hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt wget -P /mnt http://cb2.igs.umaryland.edu/vmx_bundle.tgz tar xvzf vmx_bundle.tgz /opt/vappio-util/bundle_vmx.sh /mnt/image.vmdk vmx_bundle/start_clovr.vmx.template vmx_bundle/start_clovr.vmx clovr_vmware_testing mv vmx_bundle clovr_vmware_testing tar cvzf clovr_vmware_testing.tgz clovr_vmware_testing
